availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lawrence County attorney. Kentucky native. Married Amelia C. Stewart Prichard in 1859.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 96. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 171. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Marriages, Lawrence County, 1859. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 182. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Kentucky, Ninth Congressional District, 1863, p. 295. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 3.
